mapper.select: SELECT b.com_index,b.board_index,m.m_nickname,b.com_text,b.com_good,b.com_index1 FROM board_com b, member m where board_index = #{data} and com_index1 is null and b.m_index = m.m_index

SELECT b.com_index,b.board_index,m.m_nickname,b.com_text,b.com_good,b.com_index1
FROM board_com b, member m where com_index1 = #{com_index} and b.m_index = m.m_index
mapper.insert: insert into board_com(com_index, com_text, com_index1, board_index,m_index) values(com_index.nextval, #{com_text}, #{com_index1}, #{board_index},#{m_index})
